name: @s-r0/eggy-js

scripts.task:css:post: postcss build/css/*.css --use autoprefixer cssnano -d build/css && chalk green 'Post CSS complete'
scripts.task:js:babel: babel src/js --out-dir build/js && chalk green 'Babel complete'
scripts.task:js:minify: uglifyjs build/js/eggy.js -c -o build/js/eggy.js && chalk green 'JS minify complete'
scripts.watch: clear && chokidar 'src/js/**/*.js' 'src/scss/**/*.scss' -c 'npm run -s build:css && npm run -s build:js'
scripts.prod: clear && npm run -s task:css:post && npm run -s task:js:minify && chalk bold green 'Production compile complete'

author: Sam Rutter <info@samgraphic.co.uk> (https://samgraphic.co.uk/)
description: EggyJS is a Javascript micro Library for simple, lightweight toast popups focused on being dependency-less, lightweight, quick and efficient.
